quiz.title: Question Quiz
quiz.description: Tell us your preferences and personality. Used for persona generation.

speed_dating.title: Speed Dating
speed_dating.description: Have a short conversation with virtual personas to share your communication style.
speed_dating.lounge_subtitle: Preparing for the event. Enter your name, gender and birth year to start the speed date.
speed_dating.sync_description: Your interaction rhythm has been analyzed. We will generate your persona.

review.title: Profile Review
review.description: Review the generated profile and persona, then confirm if everything looks good.
